comment: What we are witnessing is not just about the Midterm election... It's the rd stage of Marxist/Lenin doctrine intended to destroy a nation and it is called "Crisis".
amr:
# ::snt What we are witnessing is not just about the Midterm election... It's the rd stage of Marxist/Lenin doctrine intended to destroy a nation and it is called "Crisis".
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / witness-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (w2 / we)
            :ARG1 (e / elect-01
                  :mod (m2 / midterm))
            :mod (j / just))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (s / stage
                  :mod (r / rd)
                  :poss (d / doctrine
                        :mod (s2 / slash
                              :op1 (p / political-movement
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "Marxism"))
                              :op2 (p2 / political-movement
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Lenin"))))
                  :ARG0-of (ii / intend-01
                        :ARG1 (d2 / destroy-01
                              :ARG0 s
                              :ARG1 (n3 / nation))))
            :op2 (c / call-01
                  :ARG1 s
                  :ARG2 (c2 / crisis))))

# ::snt They're actually Bolsheviks, but yeah...
(c / contrast-01
      :ARG1 (p / person
            :mod (p2 / political-party
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Bolshevik"))
            :domain (t / they)
            :ARG1-of (a / actual-02))
      :ARG2 (y / yeah
            :mode expressive))
